summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to public art museum facilities; amending Ordinance 121950 to clarify that the agreement authorized by that ordinance may be modified if the modification is approved by ordinance; authorizing a restatement of a guarantee and reimbursement agreement with the Museum Development Authority and other parties that amends the original guarantee and reimbursement agreement the City entered into in 2005 as originally authorized by Ordinance 121950.
committee: Public Safety, Governmental Relations and Arts
